title: (x) Crystal Chronicles - University Roman (customized) {Karl, Mark S}
content:
Anyone know what font is used for the "Crystal Chronicles" part of the logo? I know the 'Final Fantasy' part is Runic MT.   
 ![CrystalChronicles](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141937im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23572.jpg)
author: toketsu

comments.content: It looks like a customized versiion of [University](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141937/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/university-roman/).
Ah, ok, thanks. Couldn't put it through the What the Font thing because it'd require editing out parts, and I'm just too lazy for that.
Just caffeine. Hence the double i in versiion. It's the shakes. :P
